header.div: What will I learn in this unit?

ol.li: read a report based on a graph, and answer questions based on charts.
match appropriate verb and noun phrases to trends shown in charts. You will also read a report and identify the verb and noun structures used to describe trends.
practise describing trends using appropriate verbs and noun structures.
look at a bar chart and complete a report with the correct words, and write a report based on a chart.
correct mistakes in a sample report.
